text: Inhibition of NF-kappaB activity by NAI .
Jurkat T-cells were transfected with <extra_id_0> luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> reporter plasmids containing either NF-kappaB or AP-1 cis - acting elements .

The cells were incubated with NF-kappaB activation inhibitor ( NAI ) for 1 h followed by stimulation with PMA ( 162 nM , A and C ) or HK E . coli ( 5 x 107 CFU / ml , B and D ) for 24 h . ( A , B ) NF-kappaB , but not ( C , D ) AP-1 was inhibited .
Statistical significance from the positive control ( PMA / HK E . coli ) was determined using Student 's t-test .
